300100.name: sketch_description_of_physical_strength
300100.chinesesimplified:
体力值说明：
  钓鱼是一件消耗体力的运动，每次抛竿和博鱼都会消耗一些体力。在钓场中，你也可以消耗食物来补充体力，退出钓场后，体力值完全恢复。
300100.english:
Stamina Usage:
Fishing consumes stamina. Each cast uses {0} stamina, and each fish fight uses {1} stamina. You can consume food in the fishing area to recover stamina. Stamina will be fully restored after leaving the fishing area.

300166.name: tips_the_nickname_contains_illegal_special_symbols
300166.english: The user name contains invalid special characters: @*#$￥%&<>《》?？~,，.。:：;；()（）{}[]【】+-×÷=|\/""“”'‘’`·

300167.name: tips_this_nickname_has_already_been_used
300167.chinesesimplified: 这个昵称已经有人用过啦~

300170.name: tips_name_length_invalid
300170.chinesesimplified: 请确保昵称在4-16字符数内
300170.english: Please make sure the nickname is between 4-16 characters.

300201.name: tips_scheme_name_length_invalid
300201.chinesesimplified: 请输入方案名称(16字符内)
300201.english: Please enter a setup name (max 16 characters)

300214.name: tips_cannot_be_assembled_onto_this_pole
300214.chinesesimplified: 该配件无法装配到这条竿上
300214.english: This accessory cannot be equipped to this rod

300215.name: tips_rod_will_remove_the_incompatible_accessories
300215.chinesesimplified: 存在不适配的配件，是否更换鱼竿并取下不适配的配件？
300215.english: There are incompatible accessories. Would you like to switch rods and remove the incompatible accessories?

300216.name: tips_group_has_not_been_matched_yet
300216.chinesesimplified: 钓组尚未搭配完成，请选择合适的配件
300216.english: The rig is incomplete. Please select the appropriate accessories.

300225.name: tips_pole_set_is_not_applicable_for_map
300225.chinesesimplified: 钓组【{0}】在【{1}】中不适用，是否确认使用？
300225.english: Rig【 {0} 】is not compatible with【 {1} 】. Are you sure you want to continue？

300226.name: tips_accessories_are_not_owned_and_can_be_purchased
300226.chinesesimplified: 钓组【{0}】中的配件未拥有，可进行购买
300226.english: Accessories in Rig 【{0}】 are not owned and can be purchased.

300227.name: tips_rod_group_are_not_complete

300227.english: Rig【 {0} 】is incomplete , Please complete the accessory selection.

300230.name: tips_no_fishing_rods_are_currently_available
300230.chinesesimplified: 当前没有可用的鱼竿，请补充
300230.english: No rods available, please add one

300239.name: tips_there_are_no_items_to_store_in_the_backpack

300239.english: No items to store in the backpack

300242.name: tips_items_have_been_placed_in_the_bag
300242.english: Item has been added to the backpack

300243.name: tips_items_have_been_stored_in_the_warehouse
300243.english: Items have been stored in the warehouse

300246.name: tips_no_fishing_gear_to_fit_into_the_pack
300246.chinesesimplified: 沒有渔具可放入渔具箱
300246.english: No gear to store in the tackle box

300247.name: tips_the_knapsack_is_full
300247.chinesesimplified: 食物箱已满，请先清理食物箱
300247.english: Food box is full. Please clear it first.

300248.name: tips_account_should_be_6_16_characters_long
300248.chinesesimplified: 账号需为6-16位大小写字母或数字
300248.english: Account must be 6-16 characters long, using only upper/lowercase letters or numbers.

300249.name: tips_passwords_should_be_6_16_characters_long
300249.chinesesimplified: 密码需为6-16位大小写字母或数字
300249.english: Password should be composed of 6-16 upper/lowercase letters or numbers.

300252.name: tips_the_account_cannot_contain_special_characters
300252.chinesesimplified: 账号不能含有特殊字符

300253.name: tips_the_password_cannot_contain_special_characters
300253.chinesesimplified: 密码不能含有特殊字符

300255.name: tips_the_password_error_multipe_times
300255.chinesesimplified: 密码错误多次，请1分钟后再输入
300255.english: Too many incorrect attempts. Please try again in 1 minute

300264.name: tips_please_enter_6_16_alphanumerics_plus_numbers
300264.chinesesimplified: 请输入6-16位大小写字母或数字
300264.english: Please enter a 6-16 character combination of upper/lowercase letters or numbers

300265.name: tips_please_enter_6_16_digits_letter_case_and_number_combination
300265.chinesesimplified: 请输入6-16位大小写字母或数字
300265.english: Please enter a 6-16 character combination of upper/lowercase letters or numbers.

300279.name: sketch_please_note_that_after_you_delete_your_account
300279.chinesesimplified:
请你特别请注意，注销账号后：
1.<indent=60>您不能再继续使用本账号进行游戏；</indent>
2.<indent=60>您不能找回账号，您账号下的任何权益视为您自动放弃；</indent>
3.<indent=60>我们也将不再保留您的任何信息或将对您的信息进行匿名化处理。</indent>
4.<indent=60>信息包扩账号信息、游戏日志、游戏装备等任何因使用本游戏服务而产生的数据。</indent>
5.<indent=60>与本账号关联的其他游戏的账号也会一同注销；</indent>
6.<indent=60>您在其他客户端的同账号信息也会注销。</indent>

300280.name: sketch_agree_to_the_account_cancellation_agreement
300280.chinesesimplified: <indent=60>我</indent>已经详细阅读并明确理解注销账号的后果，同意《账号注销协议》，继续注销账号
300280.english: <indent=60>I</indent> have thoroughly read and understood the consequences of canceling my account, and I agree to the "Account Cancellation Agreement." Proceed with cancellation.

300292.name: tips_the_account_cannot_be_retrieved
300292.chinesesimplified: 注销账号后，无法再找回账号，是否确定注销
300292.english: Once the account is canceled, it cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to proceed with the cancellation?

300293.name: tips_coins_is_insufficient_enter_the_mall
300293.chinesesimplified: 金币不足，是否进入商城购买
300293.english: Insufficient coins. Would you like to enter the store to purchase more?

300311.name: sketch_des_ogle_lake

300311.english: Ogle Lake is located in Brown County State Park, Amona, United States. The environment is tranquil and picturesque

300312.chinesesimplified: 鱼饵和当前钓组类型不匹配

300473.english: You don't have enough food. Do you still want to go fishing?

300475.english: Please read and confirm the account cancellation notice

300505.english: Rod set saved to backpack. Tackle box is full — hooks and baits saved to warehouse.

300507.name: tips_tackle_incomplete
300507.chinesesimplified: 当前装备不全，无法使用
300507.english: The tackle is incomplete and cannot deploy .

300517.name: tips_items_coins
300517.chinesesimplified: 通过钓鱼、完成任务等获得，可用于购买渔具、食物等
300517.english: This can be obtained through fishing, completing tasks, and other activities, and used to purchase fishing gear, food, and more.

300518.chinesesimplified: 通过成就、活动等获得，可用于购买渔具、礼包等
300518.english: This can be obtained through achievements, events, and other activities, and used to purchase fishing gear, item bundles, and more.

300527.name: tips_purchased_item_insufficient_levels
300527.chinesesimplified: 含有等级不足无法安装的钓具

800080.name: Privacy_content
800080.chinesesimplified: 点击“接受”即表示您同意我们的<color=#0066E1><link="https://okinglimited.com/agreement/en/user.html">服务条款</link></color>和<color=#0066E1><link="https://okinglimited.com/agreement/en/privacy.html">隐私协议</link></color>。请查阅这两份文件，以了解我们如何管理您的数据以及使用本游戏的相关规则
800080.english: Welcome! By clicking "Accept", you agree to our <color=#0066E1><link="https://okinglimited.com/agreement/en/user.html">Terms of Service</link></color> and <color=#0066E1><link="https://okinglimited.com/agreement/en/privacy.html">Privacy Policy</link></color>. Please review both documents to understand how we manage your data and the rules for using our game.

800084.name: task_name_explore_noob_lake_3
800084.english: There are fish behind the cover

800085.name: task_name_explore_noob_lake_4
800085.english: Bugs work better than you'd think

800097.name: task_name_explore_ogle_lake_2
800097.english: I heard there are many fish here

800099.name: task_name_explore_ogle_lake_4
800099.english: Big ones lurk in the deep

800110.name: task_name_challenge_noob_lake_2
800110.english: The more you fish, the more fun it gets

800113.name: task_name_challenge_ogle_lake_2
800113.english: The more you fish, the more fun it gets

800115.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_1
800115.chinesesimplified: 欢迎来到镜湖汀，这里有很多品种的鱼
800115.english: Welcome to MIRROR SHORE, home to many fish species!

800116.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_2
800116.chinesesimplified: 有些鱼对肉类鱼饵更感兴趣

800117.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_3
800117.chinesesimplified: 尝试抛到掩体后面，那里藏了很多小家伙
800117.english: Try casting behind the cover—many small fish hide there

800118.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_4
800118.chinesesimplified: 不如换个蚯蚓或红虫试试？
800118.english: How about switching to earthworms or bloodworms?

800120.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_6
800120.chinesesimplified: 不同的钓具搭配能钓的鱼可不太一样
800120.english: Try different gear for different catches

800121.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_7
800121.english: How about trying a new rod?

800122.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_8
800122.chinesesimplified: 听说新的渔场比这更刺激，不如去看看
800122.english: Heard the next fishing spot's even more thrilling—why not check it out?

800123.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_9
800123.chinesesimplified: 远处应该有一些大鱼出没，试试看
800123.english: Try casting far—big fish might be lurking there.

800125.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_11
800125.english: The new fishing rod casts far

800127.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_13
800127.chinesesimplified: 听说4阶的鱼竿是个好东西，可以买一个
800127.english: Word is, tier 4 rods are great—you should buy one!

800128.name: task_desc_explore_noob_lake_14
800128.english: The new rod feels fantastic in hand

800129.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_1
800129.chinesesimplified: 路亚钓法是一种很特别的钓法
800129.english: Lure fishing is a quite a unique technique

800130.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_2
800130.chinesesimplified: 听说石头附近中藏着很多的大鱼
800130.english: I heard that there are many big fish hidden near the stone

800131.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_3
800131.chinesesimplified: 路亚钓法的饵有各式各样的玩法，多试试
800131.english: Lure baits offer many techniques—try them all!

800132.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_4
800132.chinesesimplified: 听说远处有个断层，应该会有些惊喜
800132.english: There’s a fault in a distance—might be surprises there

800133.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_5
800133.chinesesimplified: 有些鱼对软虫更感兴趣
800133.english: Some fish are more interested in soft worms

800134.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_6
800134.chinesesimplified: 早晨和晚上应该是更适合的时间
800134.english: Morning and evening are more suitable times

800135.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_7
800135.chinesesimplified: 岩架里面总有些奇怪的东西
800135.english: There's always something lurking near rock ledges

800136.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_8
800136.chinesesimplified: 不同的钓具搭配能钓的鱼可不太一样
800136.english: Try different gear for different catches

800137.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_9
800137.chinesesimplified: 有些鱼总是喜欢在深水层中藏匿

800138.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_10
800138.chinesesimplified: 多试试不同的钓具和鱼饵，总有新发现
800138.english: Try different fishing tackle and baits, you’ll discover more.

800139.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_11
800139.chinesesimplified: 深坑里面有很多好东西，试试看
800139.english: Lots of good catches in deep pits—give it a try

800140.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_12
800140.chinesesimplified: 不同的钓具搭配能钓的鱼可不太一样
800140.english: Try different gear for different catches

800141.name: task_desc_explore_ogle_lake_13
800141.chinesesimplified: 路亚钓法里面作钓手法很重要，试试拖底看看
800141.english: Fishing technique is very important in lure fishing. Try to drag the bottom.
